snippet: Malawi will not host an African Union summit meeting next month after a dispute over its refusal to allow Sudan’s leader, who faces war crimes charges, to enter the country.
abstract: Malawi announces that it will not host African Union summit meeting scheduled for July 6 because the bloc insists on inviting Sudan’s President Omar Hassan al-Bashir, who faces international war crimes charges.
lead_paragraph: Malawi will not host an African Union summit meeting next month after a dispute over its refusal to allow Sudan’s leader, who faces war crimes charges, to enter the country.

headline.seo: Malawi: African Union Summit Meeting Declined

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
